Command.label: 指令
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

NotEnoughResponse.value: {0} you don't have enough {1} to attempt this!
NotEnoughResponse.label: Not enough currency response
NotEnoughResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user doesn't have enough points 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = Currencyname

SucessResponse.label: Win response
SucessResponse.tooltip:
Message sent when user wins 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = value won 
 {2} = points after win 
 {3} = Currency name
